author: Kate Morris and Sally Brown
programme: I Can Cook on the Go
method: Put the oatcakes into a sandwich bag and crush with the end of a rolling pin to make breadcrumbs. Pour the crumbs into a mixing bowl and stir in the pumpkin seeds and melted butter. Divide the mixture between four small glasses and press down gently. Mix the cream cheese and cottage cheese in a bowl, then stir in the lemon juice, tomatoes, paprika and ham. Divide the cheese mixture between the four glasses and smooth the top. Cover with cling film and chill in the fridge for 1-2 hours.
